titleStmt.title: The famous and remarkable history of Sir Richard Whittington three times Lord Major of London, who lived in the time of King Henry the Fift, in the year 1419 : with all the remarkable passages and things of note which hapned [sic] in his time, with his life and death / written by T.H.
Whittington and his cat.
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson, and are to be sold by Frances Coles ...,

notesStmt.note: Title page mutilated and reconstructed in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
